title: $99 MOVE-IN SPECIAL!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Come home to One Belmar Place in beautiful Lakewood, Colorado, nestled on the edge of Denver.', 'Our community is conveniently located in the heart of the city with stunning views of the Rocky Mountains.', 'Quick access to Highway 121 and 6 puts everything within reach.', 'Discover all that the Belmar area has to offer, and explore the wide variety of surrounding restaurants, retail venues, and parks.', 'Choose from any of our eleven floor plans, featuring one and two bedroom layouts.', 'Attached garages and fireplaces are available in select homes.', 'Every residence provides an atmosphere of comfort with walk-in closets, high ceilings, washers and dryers, and gourmet kitchens, including stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.', 'Relax on your own balcony or patio, and experience the higher standard of living you’ve been waiting for.', 'Spacious 2 bedroom with walk in closets.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'September 8, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Pets Welcome Upon Approval.', 'Maximum of 2 pets per home.', '$400 pet fee required.', 'Monthly pet rent of $35 will be charged per pet.', 'Restrictions apply.', 'Please call the office for details.', 'Pet Amenities: Dog Wash Station', 'Deposit:', '300', 'Leasing options:', '3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', '3-13 month lease terms available!', 'Prices are based on the market and change daily.', 'Application fee:', '$23/ Adult applicant', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Average $100- $200/ mo.', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type:', 'Garage, Covered, Off-Street', 'Parking notes:', 'Carports: $100/month; Detached Garages $200/month', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Private pool, Balcony/patio, Deck, Porch, Sprinkler system', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Heat: forced air, Central AC, Ceiling fans', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready, High-speed internet, Wired', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Shared pool, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Barbecue, Business center', 'Security and Access:', 'Views:', 'Mountain', 'Additional features:', 'Hardwood floor, Granite countertop, Fireplace, Jacuzzi, Hot tub / Spa, Non-Smoking Property', 'Offered by:', 'One Belmar Place', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
